displayProperties.description: Savathûn has been brought out of hiding, revealing a harrowing discovery that shakes the Vanguard. As Xivu Arath prepares to capture her sister, Savathûn offers you a bargain: free her from her worm, and she will reveal the truth about the Darkness.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Lost

preview.description: Get the Season Pass and instantly unlock the new Exotic Linear Fusion Rifle. Also get XP boosts that speed up Seasonal ranks and reward track unlocks.

displayProperties.description: The next upcoming Season in the story of Destiny 2.
displayProperties.name: Season of [Redacted]

displayProperties.description: …in circles. Ancient enemies return to plague old battlegrounds. Time moves…
displayProperties.name: Season of the Undying

displayProperties.description: Re-entwine the strands of time on Mercury and ignite the flames of hope.
displayProperties.name: Season of Dawn

displayProperties.description: A new season has begun! Roam the Tangled Shore, avenge the fall of a legend, and walk the right side of wrong in Gambit.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Outlaw

displayProperties.description: A new season has begun! Rediscover the glories of the past and acquire beautiful new instruments of destruction.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Forge

displayProperties.description: The Almighty bears down on the Last City. Join forces with unlikely allies to avert this crisis and destroy the last vestige of Cabal power in the system.
displayProperties.name: Season of Arrivals

displayProperties.description: With the Almighty bearing down on the Last City, Guardians from all walks of life unite to bring all their power to bear against the Cabal sun-killer and forge new bonds with old rivals.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Worthy

displayProperties.description: Battle Empress Caiatl's forces and prove your strength against the champions of the Cabal.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Chosen

preview.description: Get the Season Pass and instantly unlock the new Seasonal armor set and the new Solar Bow, Ticuu's Divination. You also get an XP boost that speeds up your Seasonal ranks and engram unlocks.

displayProperties.description: As the Pyramids send the system into chaos, Guardians must work with unexpected allies to hunt the monstrous forces of Xivu Arath and unravel the Hive god's network of mysterious cryptoliths.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Hunt

displayProperties.description: Savathûn has been brought out of hiding, revealing a harrowing discovery that shakes the Vanguard. As Xivu Arath prepares to capture her sister, Savathûn offers you a bargain: free her from her worm, and she will reveal the truth about the Darkness.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Lost

preview.description: Get the Season Pass and instantly unlock the new Exotic Linear Fusion Rifle. Also get XP boosts that speed up Seasonal ranks and reward track unlocks.

displayProperties.description: As the Last City is consumed by an Endless Night, Guardians must hack their way through the Vex Network with help from Mithrax, the Sacred Splicer.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Splicer

preview.description: Get the Season Pass and instantly unlock the new Exotic Stasis Sidearm. You also get XP boosts that speed up your Seasonal ranks and reward track unlocks.

displayProperties.description: The next upcoming Season in the story of Destiny 2.
displayProperties.name: Season of [Redacted]

displayProperties.description: A new season has begun! Choose what kind of Guardian you will become. Reckon with the path that lies ahead.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Drifter

displayProperties.description: A new season has begun! Venture into the Infinite Forest, uncover the mysteries of Osiris, and seek new challenges on Mercury.
displayProperties.name: Curse of Osiris

displayProperties.description: A new season has begun! Search for relics of the past, learn the secrets of Rasputin, and unearth things long forgotten beneath the frozen surface of Mars.
displayProperties.name: Resurgence

displayProperties.description: A new season has begun! Lavish yourself in gifts from the mighty Emperor Calus. Seek lost treasures throughout the system.
displayProperties.name: Season of Opulence

displayProperties.description: Use the Wayfinder's Compass to complete Wayfinder's Voyage I. Also, defeat Taken anywhere in the system. Powerful Taken in the Shattered Realm award more progress.
displayProperties.name: Wayfinder's Voyage I

displayProperties.description: Use Parallax Trajectory to focus Umbral Engrams at the Prismatic Recaster in the H.E.L.M. Open Wayfinder's Troves in the Astral Alignment activity.
displayProperties.name: Umbral Wayfinder I

displayProperties.description: Gather Ascendant Anchors from patrol destinations and the Shattered Realm.
displayProperties.name: Ascendant Ballast I

displayProperties.description: Align beacons and discover Trivial Mysteries in the Shattered Realm.
displayProperties.name: Ley Line Rumors

displayProperties.description: Defeat Guardians in Momentum Control. Earn bonus progress with Zone Advantage.
displayProperties.name: Momentum Crash

displayProperties.description: Complete Gambit matches. Earn bonus progress for wins.
displayProperties.name: Dredgin' Up Victory

displayProperties.description: Complete weekly playlist challenges.
displayProperties.name: Challenger's Aspiration

displayProperties.description: In the EDZ, earn progress by completing bounties, patrols, public events, and Lost Sectors.
displayProperties.name: EDZ Patrol

displayProperties.description: Calibrate mid-range weapons—Hand Cannons, Auto Rifles, Fusion Rifles, and Machine Guns—in the EDZ. Bonus progress for rapidly defeating combatants.
displayProperties.name: Mid-Range Calibration

displayProperties.description: Defeat Scorn combatants in strikes. Earn bonus progress for defeating tougher combatants.
displayProperties.name: Scorn Pest Control

displayProperties.description: Use the Wayfinder's Compass to complete Wayfinder's Voyage II. Also, defeat Scorn with Grenade Launchers.
displayProperties.name: Wayfinder's Voyage II

displayProperties.description: Use Parallax Trajectory to focus Umbral Engrams at the Prismatic Recaster in the H.E.L.M. Open Wayfinder's Troves in the Astral Alignment activity.
displayProperties.name: Umbral Wayfinder II

displayProperties.description: Align beacons and discover Trivial and Enigmatic Mysteries within the Shattered Realm.
displayProperties.name: Ley Line Secrets

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants with Linear Fusion Rifles. Combatants defeated in the Shattered Realm or Astral Alignment activities grant bonus progress.
displayProperties.name: Astral Lancer

displayProperties.description: Complete Iron Banner matches. Earn bonus progress for wins.
displayProperties.name: Iron Sharpens Iron

displayProperties.description: Earn points by banking Motes, defeating Blockers, and defeating Guardians in Gambit.
displayProperties.name: Drifter's Chosen

displayProperties.description: On the Tangled Shore, earn progress by completing bounties, patrols, public events, and Lost Sectors.
displayProperties.name: The Tangled Web We Weave

displayProperties.description: Complete a Lost Sector on Legend or higher.
displayProperties.name: Contender's Delve

displayProperties.description: Calibrate close-range weapons—Sidearms, Submachine Guns, Shotguns, and Swords—on the Tangled Shore. Bonus progress for rapidly defeating combatants.
displayProperties.name: Close-Range Calibration

displayProperties.description: Defeat Taken combatants in strikes. Earn bonus progress for defeating tougher combatants.
displayProperties.name: Taken Eradication

displayProperties.description: Use the Wayfinder's Compass to complete Wayfinder's Voyage III. Also, defeat Taken and Hive anywhere in the system. Stasis final blows will grant more progress.
displayProperties.name: Wayfinder's Voyage III

displayProperties.description: Focus Tier II or greater Umbral Engrams at the Prismatic Recaster in the H.E.L.M. Open Wayfinder's Troves in the Astral Alignment activity.
displayProperties.name: Umbral Wayfinder III

displayProperties.description: Complete rounds of Astral Alignment and defeat Taken with the Taken Relic.
displayProperties.name: Initiate Ley Liner

displayProperties.description: Gather Parallax Trajectories from playlist or Astral Alignment activities, or from Ascendant Anchors found on destinations and in the Shattered Realm activity.
displayProperties.name: Astral Telemetry I

displayProperties.description: Defeat Guardians in Team Scorched. Earn bonus progress for charged detonations.
displayProperties.name: Sacred Scorcher

displayProperties.description: Defeat Taken in Gambit. Earn bonus progress for defeating tougher combatants.
displayProperties.name: Primeval Entourage

displayProperties.description: On the Moon, earn progress by completing bounties, patrols, public events, and Lost Sectors.
displayProperties.name: Light Moon Rising

displayProperties.description: Reach Power Level {var:4112892655} by earning powerful rewards and Prime Engrams.
displayProperties.name: Challenger's Apogee

displayProperties.description: Calibrate long-range weapons—Pulse Rifles, Bows, and Trace Rifles—on the Moon. Bonus progress in Lost Sectors.
displayProperties.name: Long-Range Calibration

displayProperties.description: Defeat Champions in any Nightfall strike on Hero difficulty or higher. Earn bonus progress at higher difficulty tiers.
displayProperties.name: Ultimate Champion

displayProperties.description: Use the Wayfinder's Compass to complete Wayfinder's Voyage IV. Also defeat Scorn anywhere in the system. Defeating Scorn with melee abilities grants bonus progress.
displayProperties.name: Wayfinder's Voyage IV

displayProperties.description: Gather Parallax Trajectories from playlist or Astral Alignment activities, or from Ascendant Anchors found on destinations and in the Shattered Realm activity.
displayProperties.name: Astral Telemetry II

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants with Trace Rifles. Combatants defeated in the Shattered Realm or Astral Alignment activities grant bonus progress.
displayProperties.name: Astral Authority

displayProperties.description: Align beacons and discover Trivial and Ascendant Mysteries within the Shattered Realm.
displayProperties.name: Ley Line Mysteries

displayProperties.description: Complete matches in the Showdown Crucible playlist. Earn bonus progress for wins.
displayProperties.name: Entertain Lord Shaxx

displayProperties.description: Defeat powerful combatants in Gambit. Earn bonus progress for defeating high-value targets.
displayProperties.name: High-Value Hunter

displayProperties.description: Unlock artifact mods.
displayProperties.name: Trials of the Tinker

displayProperties.description: Calibrate marksman weapons—Scout Rifles, Sniper Rifles, and Linear Fusion Rifles—by landing precision final blows. Bonus progress against Guardians.
displayProperties.name: Precision Calibration

displayProperties.description: Complete any Nightfall strike on Hero difficulty or higher.
displayProperties.name: Vanguard Chosen

displayProperties.description: Use the Wayfinder's Compass to complete Wayfinder's Voyage V. Also, defeat Taken with Bows anywhere in the system.
displayProperties.name: Wayfinder's Voyage V

displayProperties.description: Use Ager's Scepter to carve a path through Illusory Barriers in the Shattered Realm and claim the treasures they conceal. Additionally, align beacons in the Shattered Realm.
displayProperties.name: Deceiving Appearances

displayProperties.description: Gather Ascendant Anchors from patrol destinations and the Shattered Realm.
displayProperties.name: Ascendant Ballast II

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants with Hand Cannons and Stasis damage. Combatants defeated in the Astral Alignment activity grant bonus progress.
displayProperties.name: Stellar Aim

displayProperties.description: Capture zones in any Crucible match.
displayProperties.name: Zone Controller

displayProperties.description: Acquire the seasonal ritual weapon.
displayProperties.name: Astral Calibration

displayProperties.description: Defeat Taken and Scorn bosses in strikes.
displayProperties.name: Strike at Xivu Arath's Minions

displayProperties.description: Use the Wayfinder's Compass to complete Wayfinder's Voyage VI. Also, Defeat Scorn anywhere in the system. Powerful Scorn in the Alignment Activity grant bonus progress.
displayProperties.name: Wayfinder's Voyage VI

displayProperties.description: Gather Parallax Trajectories from playlist or Astral Alignment activities, or from Ascendant Anchors found on destinations and in the Shattered Realm activity.
displayProperties.name: Astral Telemetry III

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants with Fusion Rifles and Solar melee attacks. Combatants defeated in the Shattered Realm activity will grant bonus progress.
displayProperties.name: Solar Fusion Power

displayProperties.description: Complete rounds of Astral Alignment and install Paracausal Batteries.
displayProperties.name: Advanced Ley Liner

displayProperties.description: Acquire the Crucible ornament for Ascendancy.
displayProperties.name: Display of Dominance

displayProperties.description: Masterwork a piece of armor.
displayProperties.name: Apex Armorer

displayProperties.description: Stun Champions.
displayProperties.name: Sling the Stone…

displayProperties.description: Use the Wayfinder's Compass to complete Wayfinder's Voyage VII. Also, defeat Taken or Scorn with Shotguns anywhere in the system.
displayProperties.name: Wayfinder's Voyage VII

displayProperties.description: Focus Tier III Umbral Engrams at the Prismatic Recaster in the H.E.L.M.
displayProperties.name: Umbral Maven

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants with Stasis abilities, Solar abilities, or shatter damage. Combatants defeated with Solar or Stasis melee attacks award bonus progress.
displayProperties.name: Freezerburn

displayProperties.description: Complete the Alignment activity in under 10 minutes.
displayProperties.name: Efficient Ley Liner

displayProperties.description: Complete Crucible matches in the Glory Rank playlist. Earn bonus progress for wins.
displayProperties.name: Cadre of Contenders

displayProperties.description: Defeat targets with Fusion Rifles and Swords in Gambit. Defeating Guardians grants additional progress.
displayProperties.name: Bring a Fusion Sword

displayProperties.description: Complete any Nightfall strike on Grandmaster.
displayProperties.name: Conquest of the Mighty

displayProperties.description: Complete a Legendary branch of the Shattered Realm.
displayProperties.name: Aggressive Cartography

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants with Swords in the Shattered Realm activity. Defeating powerful combatants grants bonus progress.
displayProperties.name: Shattered Blademaster

displayProperties.description: Complete the Astral Alignment activity and destroy Ether.
displayProperties.name: Ruthless Ley Liner

displayProperties.description: Acquire the Gambit ornament for Ascendancy.
displayProperties.name: Display of Authority

displayProperties.description: Reach Power Level {var:1131227462} by earning pinnacle rewards.
displayProperties.name: Pinnacle

displayProperties.description: Calibrate Fusion Rifles and Swords. Earn bonus progress against opposing Guardians.
displayProperties.name: Fusion Rifle and Sword Calibration

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants with Auto Rifles and melee attacks. Defeating combatants in the Astral Alignment activity grants bonus progress.
displayProperties.name: Astral Assault

displayProperties.description: Complete the Astral Alignment activity at Legendary difficulty.
displayProperties.name: Legendary Ley Liner

displayProperties.description: Win multiple rounds in the Trials of Osiris.
displayProperties.name: Trial by Firing Squad

displayProperties.description: Complete Gambit matches with each elemental subclass.
displayProperties.name: Elemental Gambit

displayProperties.description: Calibrate Kinetic, Energy, and Power weapons. Bonus progress against Champions.
displayProperties.name: Armory-Wide Calibration

displayProperties.description: Complete strikes as each elemental subclass.
displayProperties.name: Elemental Splicing

displayProperties.description: Fully upgrade the Barrier Breach, True Sight, and Safe Passage abilities.
displayProperties.name: Techeun's Cunning

displayProperties.description: Complete the Legendary Shattered Realm activity in under 25 minutes.
displayProperties.name: Ascendant Quickening

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants with Solar abilities, Stasis abilities, or shatter damage. Rapidly defeating combatants with Supers grants bonus progress.
displayProperties.name: Cold Light of Day

displayProperties.description: Acquire the Vanguard ornament for Ascendancy.
displayProperties.name: Display of Supremacy

displayProperties.description: Repel Xivu Arath's footholds in the Dreaming City by completing bounties, patrols, public events, and Lost Sectors.
displayProperties.name: Dreaming City Defense

seasonalChallenges.name: Seasonal Challenges
seasonalChallenges.description: Complete limited-time challenges for Season rank, Bright Dust, and other rewards.
